text: hello and welcome to cupcake addictions
layered rainbow cupcake in a jar

layered rainbow cupcake in a jar these
are great for favors and for little

nice twist on a traditional favorite so
let's get started
tools and equipment that we will be
using I've got a ziploc bag and I've
prefilled that with some of our
perfectly pipeable buttercream frosting
just in plain vanilla plain white I've

I will leave dimensions in the

my little mini decorative lolli jar so
you can either use a Mason or a lolli

and you'll need to make sure that your

I'm only using the end of this piping

you've got tiny little circle cutters or
something else that's going to be about
that size you can also use that I've got
vanilla cupcakes that I've colored so
you can see here I've taken my plain

you can choose whatever colors you like

below it's a nice little touch that you

but if you're just looking for a little

a little bit of discoloration and we

amount on the bottom of each just to
reveal that lovely color underneath
and then on the top don't take off the

all right so we've got all of those
divided now you're only going to need

it doesn't really matter and you're
going to get three of these jars for

cupcakes per jar so for every dozen

I've just got white frosting on top but

really not going to matter too much
all right now from here you want to

without just sliding them in it stops

of that bag it doesn't have to be a

now you want to squeeze just gently

now give it a couple of good taps on the

you'll see there at the bottom of our

so then just take your piping bag or
